Package ie.gmit.sw.query

Interface Query

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QueryFile, QueryString
    public interface Query
    An object that will be passed to QueryParser for parsing.
    See Also:
    QueryFile, QueryString

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int MAX_QUERY_LENGTH
      The default length of the query string.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getQuery()
      Method used by the Parser for retrieving the text that will be parsed.
      default java.lang.String removeWhitespace​(java.lang.String queryString)
      Removes any newlines, carriage returns and extra spaces from the query string.

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_QUERY_LENGTH

        static final int MAX_QUERY_LENGTH
        The default length of the query string. Heuristically, only the first ~400 characters are needed to determine the query's language.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getQuery

        java.lang.String getQuery()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Method used by the Parser for retrieving the text that will be parsed.

        Typically this need only be the first ~400 characters of content, since that is all that is required in order to generate a sufficient set of n-grams for correctly identifying a language.

        Returns:
        The string that will be parsed by the QueryParser
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This method can throw a checked exception

      • removeWhitespace

        default java.lang.String removeWhitespace​(java.lang.String queryString)
        Removes any newlines, carriage returns and extra spaces from the query string.
        Parameters:
        queryString - The query string
        Returns:
        The query string sans whitespace
